Why draw when you can be Acting Out!

Play video charades with friends on your phone! Laugh out loud with this new party game on the go!

Have a blast with your friends as you try to act out and guess each other's words. No prior acting experience required! Move around, dance, sing, use props, do impressions - anything to get your point across - just don't say the word you're acting out!

Watch the trailer! http://youtu.be/XwXZpGH036c


PRAISE FOR ACTING OUT:

"That looks really cool, great trailer!" - Matt Rix, creator of Trainyard

"I really suck at drawing, so this game is a great replacement for Draw Something!" - Guy

"My boyfriend and I are long distance and we CRACKED up while playing this :)" - Allison

FEATURES:

* Play When You Want
Take five! Take turns acting and guessing at your own pace.

* Achieve Greatness
Over 30 achievements! Can you become the Best Actor/Actress?

* Got Stuck? Blow It Up!
Puzzled by a difficult word? Blow it up with dynamite and get new words and hints!

* Never Get Bored!
Still don't like your word choices? Create your own words to act out!

* Safe
Invite-only play means no unwanted surprises from random strangers!

* No Facebook Login Required
Play even if you're not on the social network

* Take Your Time
Record up to 60 seconds of video!


FOR BEST RESULTS: ENABLE PUSH NOTIFICATIONS TO KNOW WHEN IT'S YOUR TURN
